# horizon 𓈌 Axt Achter

𓈌 horizon <> red desert <> mars <> 𓐝 𓐛 mere mǣre (border, part) 󳠡

𓈌 ᵈhorizon 𓈋 durazone

󴄔 󳲲 󳲳 󳲴 󳲵 horus-zone

󴄘 horizank 𓈌𓋹

󴄓 󴄕 󴄖 󴄗 Herr vs

󳻓 vs 󳻌 󳻍 󳻎 󳻏 󳻐 󳻑 󳻒

𒀭𒌫 ᶞan-ʰur2 "horizon" 𒀭𒌫 ʰorigin⇔horizon

𒀭𒍠 an-zag "horizon, border of heaven"

𓇥 𓂋 𓂝 𓅱 𓏮 | limit | ὅρος hóros ὅριον hórion ⇔ horizon

𓈌 𓅡 | open |
𓈌 𓏏 𓉐 | horizon |
𓈌 𓈌 𓀭 | horizon-dweller |
𓈌 𓏏 𓉐 𓅂 𓀭 𓏪 | horizon-dwellers |
𓈌 𓏏 𓅂 | (pl.) horizon-dwellers ( a remote people) |
𓏏 𓅜 𓐍 𓏳 𓏳 𓀭 | horizon-dweller
𓅜 𓐍 𓏏 𓏳 𓍘 𓇋 | horizon-dweller |
𓅜 𓐍 𓏏 𓏳 | horizon, (tomb (of king) |
𓅜 𓏏 𓈌 𓉐 | horizon, tomb (of king) |
𓄿 𓐍 | horizon-dwellers | Achaer
𓄿 𓐍 𓄿 | stars | acra⋍astra

𓅱 𓍑 𓄿 𓂻 𓂋 𓈌 𓏏 𓉐 | go to the horizon (die) |
